Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Amulet fragment
Description: A very finely modelled fragment from a pale-blue glazed faience amulet of the goddess Taweret. On her head she wears a small modius headdress and before her she grasps the top of either an ankh or 'sa' (for protection) hieroglyph.
